about_the_game:
Let's HoBBee is a top-down management game which gives you basics and knowledge regarding beekeeping. You will have to learn the rules, look for best options and react on changes. Having in mind that is up to you whether you will be successful in this kind of job. Each nature aspect matters - weather type and seasoning as well as noticing the right moment to make a decision.

Build hives and develop business


- chose the type and size of hive
- place in proper area
- decide about composition of the bee family
- make decision about sales, purchases and strategy

Collect resources


- take care about food supplies for bees
- don't forget about the tools you need
- think about optimal inventory
